TopicTitle: Luftwaffe He-162 VolksjÃƒÂ¤ger [The Terrible German Fighter]

Articles.Content:
Now I know why it killed almost as many of its own pilots in crashes in fires as it shot down allied planes. The German engineers were drinking moonshine while designing this thing.

![0N6h8lf.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/0N6h8lf.jpg)

She handles... acceptably. At least better than a flying brick wall...

It cruises at 220 m/s with a large fuel load.

At least it lands and takes off easily.

If you're feeling like a suicidal German Pilot, go ahead: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/f3ahbghjlixo6lb/He-162A.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/f3ahbghjlixo6lb/He-162A.craft?dl=0)

![WDtkMEX.png](http://i.imgur.com/WDtkMEX.png)

![ba6gbQO.png](http://i.imgur.com/ba6gbQO.png)

![JGD09k3.png](http://i.imgur.com/JGD09k3.png)

![wvB3fi1.png](http://i.imgur.com/wvB3fi1.png)

![Wkr7qaZ.png](http://i.imgur.com/Wkr7qaZ.png)

Haha , finally it's fun !

Maybe German could turn it into Drone fighter !

**This is the replica police, please leave the standard 1.25 meter size engine nacelle. You will come with us, and you will use the only true nacelle building technique: The FAIRING! You CANNOT resist!**

![LQZiBxq.png](http://i.imgur.com/LQZiBxq.png)

**That it does not work is irrelevant!**

![2xr57MJ.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/2xr57MJ.png?1)

**You will be repped if you do not submit. This is your last warning.** ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
